system.description: The character has trained one of their comrades to exceptional standards, making them a more effective combatant.
system.benefit: Character Selects one of their Comrades, that Comrade grants an additional +5 to Ballistic Skill Tests from the Ranged Volley Order, and an additional +5 to Weapon Skill Tests when participating in the Close Quarters Order. They can also be given Veteran Orders. If the original Comrade for whom this talent was purchased for dies, its effects can be applied to a new Comrade when the character has a chance to request reinforcements.

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Comrade
specialAbilities.description: One selected Comrade grants +5 BS from Ranged Volley Orders, +5 WS from Close Quarters Orders, and can be given Veteran Orders.
